name: csc349-prereqs
description: Thread covering the exact prerequisites and override workflow for CSC 349.

events.content: Can someone confirm the prereqs for CSC 349 next quarter? The catalog site is confusing and I'm trying to plan my schedule.
You need to have both CSC 248 and CSC 357 completed with a C- or better before registration opens. The Registrar cross-checks automatically, so block out a retake if either is in progress.
If you're taking 357 right now, your best bet is to grab a backup elective because the system won't issue a permission number until grades post.

If you finished everything but the system still blocks you, email cpslo-reg@calpoly.edu with your unofficial transcript and ask for a CSC 349 override code. Copy the department office so they can verify.
Perfect, thanks! I'll keep 248/357 on my checklist and watch for that override email if I still get blocked.
